value:
I have to wear this for a mission,
s-so don't think this is a normal
thing for me...

Clarisse would look better in this
Plegian garb than I do. She's so
beautiful, and cheerful too...

Um... If you see Kris, please tell him
he's a bit too...exposed, wearing this
type of clothing around.

Is there anything that needs doing?
I get nervous standing around with
nothing to do...

Dorothea, Lene, and Tharja are all
such fantastic people, aren't they?$k$pI know it will probably never happen,
but I'd love to be like those three one
day, somehow.

My name is Katarina. I've brought
a gift from $Nf.

I must be doing well today! I'll be
sure to make the most of it while
I can!
I'm fine, I'm fine. I can keep going!

Ungh... I'm going to keep working
at it. Don't leave me behind...
Thank you for your generosity.

My name is Katarina. I happen to be
in the midst of a mission, so please
ignore the clothes I'm wearing...

Oh no... The pin fell out...and I have
no idea where!$k$pIf you hadn't pointed it out, this cloth
around my waist could have fallen,
and then where would I be?$k$pI hear these clothes are from a distant
realm. My world has a similar fashion,
but this fabric is even finer...$k$pWhile I do enjoy the compliments,
I can't help but think this garb would
be best suited for assassination...$k$pI would use it that way, if you asked.
I will take the missions others won't.
You need only say the word.
はあっ
決めます
ううっ
やられました…
I can't let you run!
You're going to die.
It's over now.
Forgive me!
I'm truly sorry...
sigh...
My name is Katarina. You might not recognize me—these are Plegian clothes.
Agh! Did... Did I deserve that?
Clothing for hot places is bold... Am I wearing it right?
Plegian mages curse people? Fearsome.
I would like to visit a desert, and see the land stretch on and on...
This outfit matches Kris's. I like that.
If you get stuck with a curse, I'll find a way to remove it. I promise!
Happy to!
Hm...
Let's make a plan.
